Calculate Revenue for a Specific Column Value

Source: R/kpis.R
calculate_revenue_for.Rd

Calculate Revenue for a Specific Column Value

Usage

calculate_revenue_for(x, col, val)

Arguments

x

A data.table following the structure defined in the "E-commerce Data Table Structure" section.

col

The column name to filter on.

val

The value to filter for.

Value

Total revenue for the specified column value.
